isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 2000, 4000, 8000 - ELECTRONIC ENGINES, CATERPILLAR C-10 AND C-12 ENGINES - OPERATION - Service Brake Switch

svcproc.title: Service Brake Switch
svcproc.para: Circuit 97AL is an input to the ECM through connector (1014) terminal 45. The ground or common side of the service brake switch is connected through circuits 97H, 97-GB, 97-GA and 97-G to connector (1014) terminal 5. With service brakes released(switch closed), the ECM sees 0 volts at connector (1014) terminal 4. Applying the brakes opens the switch, and the ECM sees 5 volts at terminal 45.
